uk.gov.nationalarchives.droid.binFileReader
Interface ByteReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractByteReader, FileByteReader, InputStreamByteReader, StreamByteReader, UrlByteReader
public interface ByteReader

Interface for accessing the bytes from a file, URL or stream.

Create an instance with AbstractByteReader.newByteReader().

Author:
linb

setFileMarker

void setFileMarker(long markerPosition)
Position the file marker at a given byte position.

The file marker is used to record how far through the file the byte sequence matching algorithm has got.

Parameters:
markerPosition - The byte number in the file at which to position the marker

getFileMarker

long getFileMarker()
Gets the current position of the file marker.

Returns:
the current position of the file marker

getByte

byte getByte(long fileIndex)
Get a byte from file

Parameters:
fileIndex - position of required byte in the file
Returns:
the byte at position fileIndex in the file
